game.title: A Thief in the Night
game.objective: Speak with the village elder to learn about the stolen artifact
game.description: The precious Ruby of Serenity has been stolen from the village elder. Speak with him to learn about the thief's identity and location.

task.objective: Speak with Elder Grimbald to begin the quest
task.description: Find Elder Grimbald in the village and speak with him about the stolen Ruby of Serenity.

task.objective: Find out who stole the Ruby of Serenity
task.description: Speak with the villagers to learn about any suspicious activities or individuals in the village.

task.objective: Confront the thief and retrieve the Ruby of Serenity
task.description: Find the thief and confront them about the stolen Ruby of Serenity. Be prepared for a fight.
